page.title: 06TOURISTS
page.content:
Tourists come to Bournemouth for the climate and the beach because it is clean and sandy. Many of the visitors have been before, and they come mainly from the Midlands.
The tourists stay mainly in hotels near the sea front and the most popular ones are on the west cliff, or in holiday flats.
Bournemouth has a large shopping centre and visitors are able to buy souvenirs and clothes. The Bournemouth International Centre opened earlier in the year and the tourists I spoke to liked it.There are also night clubs, cinemas, ice skating rinks and other leisure centres for visitors to enjoy.
Emma Godwin _ 2C1
